Class LoginScreenViewController

java.lang.Object
View.ViewControllers.LoginScreenViewController
public class LoginScreenViewController
extends java.lang.Object
Handles Login screen interface interactions.

    • setTextFieldStyle

      public void setTextFieldStyle​(java.lang.String field, java.lang.String style)
      Change TextField style. Used when a field is not correct.
      Parameters:
      field - Name of the field that must change
      style - New style to be applied. If different from "red", it's considered to be "default".

    • newAccount

      public void newAccount()
      Action of "Sign Up" button. Changes from the "Log in" screen to the "Account creation" screen.
